dmca.title: Illegal software license on a server
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: clone@clone.gr [mailto:clone@clone.gr] 
Sent: Friday, May 11, 2007 11:41 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: Illegal software license on a server

Hello,
my name is Natalia Andriichuk and I'm the owner of Greek company
Clone.gr

This is the second e-mail who I send you about a client of yours who use
a
copy of our software without our permition. We waiting reply to our
first
email but you never do and after 2-3 days contact with us the lawyer of
illegal software owner and wrote you "close" our case.

After this I send you a second email and this will be the last before we
give the problem to our lawyers.

The story:

At Apr. 20, 2007 your client purchase 130$ for our web software "My Fox
Videos" via Paypal.com (My Fox Videos is a module-plugin for software
Phpfox - http://www.phpfox.com ).

Our support team install on his website our software but meet some
problems because this software need some requirements libraries and
settings add in server for work carefully. Your client find a company
who
makes these installations and next day the software work carefully.
After
a few ours your client have problems with files size limits and can't
work
with some files who was be over X megabytes. Our support look in
software
and understand there was a problem with server settings. His server
support trying find the solution but without results.
After this person send to our support 10+ emails per day and tell them
the
problem was with our software and we must the solution. We tryind
explain
this can't be our software problem because the settings are very heigher
than who give the problem. (notice, our software work perfect in 200+
servers without problems).

He continue the emails to our support team and say always the problem is
with our software etc.
After all these we make a complete refund (April 23, 2004)  to his
payment
and we give the order to our support unistall the software from his
website.

Next 2-3 ours he contact with us and wrote about destroy  his website,
we
never ask a refund etc.

Our support go in his website and the only who will see was our software
in his website again! (from a backup I guess).
Our support contact with him and wrote him about refund etc and wrote he
is install again our software for make tests and solve the server's
problem.
Our support tell him send a email to our sales team about that, but
never
do. After 2-3 days our support see our software on his website and work
without problems like this is his property. He and his members upload
normally videos on website without have our permition for use this
software.

Sales team contact with this person and without any problem just say "I
don't unistall the software if you don't fix my server problem"!!!.

After all these we contact with you and you never reply but we take an
answer from his lawyer who ask balances and wrote "we are not the owners
of our software" and many others. He wrote send  us 100$ for close the
problem and we say ok. At next email wrote they send these money if we
solve his server's issue.
________________________________________________________________________
_____

So, we don't make deal and we ask now from you take care for COMPLETE
UNISTALL or our software fron this website.

________________________________________________________________________
_____

Informations:

Your client:

Website: http://www.ftcchat.net/

Our software: http://www.ftcchat.net/video/

Server IP: 67.15.134.78



Our Informations:

Software title: My Fox Videos for Phpfox

Copyright: registerered with Copyright Witness - Registration number:
270962
(If you need we can sent you with email or fax a copy or our copyright
certificate)

Software official website: http://www.clone.gr/fox/

Software sales: http://www.clone.gr/sales/


Thank you and Im waiting your reply.
Sorry about my bad English.


Notice: We are your clients (we are partners of "Internet Solutions LTD"
-
http://isol.gr ) and we use your servers for 250+ of our clients. When
we
have similar problems with any of these clients we  resolved in minutes.


-- 
Clone.gr
Hosting and Development Solutions
Amoriou 10-12
11251, Athens - Greece
Phone: +30 212 000 2144 - +30 212 000 2145
